placeholderText: Upload a file (Image/PDF) and click 'Start PDF/Image OCR' to see results
helperText: Supports PNG, JPG, WEBP, PDF. Max 20MB.
instructionsPlaceholder: e.g., Extract table data only, Summarize the document, Identify the address
dropzoneAriaLabel: File drop zone or click to browse
errorInvalidType: Invalid file type: {fileType}. Allowed: PNG, JPG, WEBP, PDF.
errorSizeLimit: File is too large. Maximum 20MB allowed.
errorFetch: Error sending request: Server responded with status {status}.
errorNoStream: Server did not send any data to stream.
errorDecode: Error decoding the response from the server.
errorCopy: Failed to copy to clipboard. Please copy manually.
statusError: An error occurred. See message above.
statusEmpty: No text found in the result.
statusBlockedSafety: Request blocked due to safety policy.
statusBlockedRecitation: Request blocked due to recitation policy.
